title: Is We Dumb? | Javelin. Cops. Notebook. Oozing.
description:
Do you ever wonder what the Olympics would look like if every athletic was given a ton of LSD before competing in their event? Let's talk about that, advertisers trying to hack into your brain while you sleep, how stupid self-checkout machines can be, running for your life from the cops that didn't even know you existed, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

STREET TEAM: At high noon, pacific time, on Monday, August 16th, the stickers will go live on badmagicmerch.com. These stickers are free… but there will only be 500 sticker packs available… first come, first serve. Once they're gone, that's it… and only one sticker pack per person.Once you receive your stickers, all you have to do is slap them all over the place, snap a picture of where you put them, and then post that picture on IG and FB using the hashtag #BadMagicStreetTeam. That’s it!! A winner will be picked at random on Monday, October 18th. The more you post, the better your odds of winning. The random winner gets a $200 merch credit! Please don’t do anything stupid and harass any business with this. Each post throws another piece of paper with your name on it into the digital hat.

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/k9f1uUiGSHc

Show Links:

Crazy Motorcycle | https://bit.ly/3BipCPr

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

All Merch Inquiries: store@badmagicproductions.com

Merch: http://badmagicmerch.com

author: dan@dancummins.tv (Dan Cummins)
